35619074.review: This game is easy to learn, although it starts slow and rather tedious when all or most skills are still unlocked.The graphics are nice, and the battle get more interesting as time progresses (with more intense enemy attacks combined with effects from your own side's artillery barrage, helicopter strike, etc). Unfortunately there are only a few levels, the player position is fixed, and there's no actual storyline. Basically, you select a level and fight incoming enemies for as long as possible. More suitable for people who want a casual "never-ending" kind of game.

35597975.review:
C'est une agréable surprise, en ce qui me concerne, pour ce rail-shooter où il faut résister le plus longtemps possible face aux ennemis de plus en plus nombreux. Il y a "seulement" 4 maps au menu du jeu, par contre elles sont vraiment dans des lieux bien différents, ce qui fait que la manière de se défendre n'est pas forcément la même, du moins il faut savoir utiliser les atouts qui sont à notre disposition de façon judicieuse pour ne pas mourir trop vite, sans oublier de faire un maximum de victimes.

Dans ce jeu, il y a deux objectifs en fait, le premier étant donc de résister le plus lomptemps possible aux assauts des ennmis mais aussi de faire un maximum de kill pour débloquer des perks dans 4 arbres de compétences différents.

Ce n'est pas le jeu de l'année je vous l'accorde mais il est plaisant à jouer, de surcroît il n'est pas vilain graphiquement, j'irai même jusqu'à dire qu'il est assez joli (pour un jeu à 5€), les explosions sont bien faites par exemple, les décors sont destructibles aussi ce qui rajoute à l'immersion.

Enfin pour résumer, si vous voulez vous prendre pour RAMBO, que vous voulez faire votre guerre, que vous voulez défourailler tout ce qui bouge, que vous êtes assez endurant pour défendre votre position et bien IS Defense est un jeu qui peut certainement vous plaire :D

Article disponible sur mon blog: https://malaxtwitch.blogspot.fr/2017/10/is-defend-cest-ma-guerre-mon-colonel_9.html

35428754.review:
Az elmúlt pár év Közel-keleti háborús eseményei következtében az arab világban létrejött az Iszlám Állam, mely az évtized végére elfoglalta egész Észak-Afrikát és most már a Földközi-tengeren átkelve elfoglalva Szicíliát, a Kalifátus Európa határait fenyegeti.

A feladat egyszerű: minél több muszlimot kell átküldeni Allah mennybéli kuplerájába, mielőtt mi is a túlvilágra költöznénk.
Talán nem nagy titok, hogy mindenképp meg fogunk halni. Egy toronyban vagyunk egy géppuska és egy rakétavető társaságában és ennyi. Ahogy telik az idő, úgy az iszonyú muszlim sereg egyre nagyobbra hízik és megöl, de sebaj, a lemészárolt  katonákért/járműveikért tapasztalat pontot kapunk, amit fejlesztésre költhetünk, és úgy veselkedhetünk neki ismét a harcnak, kitolni minél tovább a csatát. Ha már mindent maximumra húztunk akkor átélhetjük az utóbbi idők legpörgősebb digitális pokoljárását, ahol ezrek haláloznak el pár perc alatt. Természetesen mi egyedül nem vagyunk képesek ennyi embert megölni, segítségünre vannak speciális támogatások, pontosan öt darab, melyek az ellenség pusztulása után kapott tapasztalati pontokkal indíthatók el. Első az ellátmány, mely ad rakétát, vagy életerőt. Második a gyalogság mozgósítása, kb 7-8 katonát küld ki a csatatérre. Sajnos nagyobb szinten, mikor már minden lángol és robban hamar halnak, így nem sok értelme van kivezényelni őket. Harmadik a tüzérség bevetése, a lövegek rövid idő alatt felperzselik a torony környékét, hamuvá változtatva minden gyalogos dzsihádistát. A negyedik képesség F16-osokat hív rádión, míg az ötödik legmagasabb képesség egy Black Hawk helikoptert, ami jó ideig fölöttünk köröz, géppuskával szétdarabolva mindent, ami mozog, illetve fejlesztéseknek köszönhetően később rakétákkal is megáldja a rosszfiúkat.
A helyzet percről perce durvul és elég egy kicsi hiba, és a játéknak vége.
A fejleszthető négy kategóriát a személyes (1. Életerő fejlesztések, 2. Géppuskával kapcsolatos fejlesztések, 3, Rakétavető fejlesztés) illetve a támogató erők fejlesztései képezik.

A fejlesztők első játéka sem volt piskóta, de ez a toronyharc messze a legpörgősebb FPS amit mostanában láttam. Van az a rész a Rambo 4-ben mikor Stallone bepattan a gépágyú mögé és mindenkit halomra gyilkol, kb ahhoz hasonló élményben van része a játékosnak itt.
A program most már szerencsére csupán fiktív ISIS történetet mutat be, ennek ellenére a témával több játéknak kellene foglalkoznia.

35363184.review:
Firstly, let's forget the theme. You're going to be mowing down digital humans for fun, it's hardly important what clothes they're wearing so chill your triggers.

Secondly, it's a puddle deep turret shooter with some progressive persistent unlocks. So enter only those who want a violent alternative to minesweeper.

That said lets get onto some observations.

The persistent unlocks offer something to strive for, of course that also means once you've unlocked some of the juicier items you're left chasing scores and leaderboard positions. These do highlight your friends which is kind of neat but you can only see this while playing, can't see an option to do it from the menu which is a bit odd.

As the developer of Hatred I did expect a bit more gore but alas you'll need to settle for some nice explosion effects. Reality is you'll rarely see or have time to appreciate any of the human/bullet relationship detail. 

Grind. Each map unlocks after achieving a cumulative enemy and vehicle kill target. This means you'll be playing the same map many times before you can move onto similar gameplay over a new canvas. The lack of variety therefore is a bit of a negative, the positive being you're not going to see all the maps in less than 4 hours and well you'll be earning xp to unlock those persistent skill upgrades.

As noted by other reviewers, some of those upgrades remove a lot of the hinderances the game starts off with such as needing to reload or operate the rotation of the turret via keys. Judge yourself whether you feel this sucks although it should be said you don't have to upgrade those skills (but you can't deactivate one you've purchased!).

Levels play out randomly which can impact your run and I question to some degree how leaderboards would be totally reflective of people's skill when RNG could influence the result but bah, it's a silly game so why worry about that.

An annoyance I found most impacting of my fun was the attacks from the sides. While it's neat you are forced to change your focus to a new area of the maps it's also often done while you're also being attacked from the front. There are some support powers you could call in at this time but it again leaves you somewhat open to RNG on how much damage you'll be unable to avoid.

On the whole. I'd reccommend this if you want some dumb brainless fun with some challenge (and a sprinkle of RNG). Workshop support is in there (although I see only two entries as of writing) so there may be some additional longevity or at least eye candy in the future. Get it cheap and I think this is a good one for a quick blast now and again.

35241540.review:
総評：非常に出来の良いシンプル2000シリーズじみたシンプルゲーム

迫りくるテロリストの豚どもを固定砲台でひたすら迎撃する耐久固定シューティング。
非常にシンプルなゲーム性ながら、妙に中毒性の高い古き良きゲームスタイル。

基本は機関銃（装弾数200発）とロケランでひたすら撃ちまくるだけ。
殺害数に応じてポイントが５段階まで溜まり、
補給物資投下（ライフとロケラン弾）＜ 歩兵召喚 ＜ 支援砲撃 ＜ 空爆 ＜ ヘリ召喚 の順に支援を要請できる。
歩兵が敵に気づいて攻撃してくれるので便利。

また一定の殺害？ごとにスキルポイントが与えられ、
ライフを増やしたり、機関銃の精度を上げたり、ロケランの威力を上げたり、支援の効果を増強したり、
カテゴリごとにスキルを取得して強化できる。
とりあえず機関銃の最終スキル【無限マガジン】を取得したら、
200発の装弾数が無くなってリロードする必要無く撃ちまくれるので便利。
スキルはポイントさえ溜まれば順番は気にせず取得できる様子。

最初は100人も殺せないくらい難しいけど死んでもスキルポイントは増えていくので、
何度も挑戦する内にドンドン強くなっていくから頑張ろう。

セールで300円で購入したけど、シンプル2000シリーズにラインナップされてても満足のクオリティです。

35210137.review:
Przekaz tej gry jest prosty. NIE dla islamizacji Europy :). Kontrowersyjne podejście ale jakże udane. Gra to zwykły deffense, gdzie siedzimy w stanowisku CKMu i prujemy na nabrzeżu do bojowników ISIS, szturmujacych w 2020 roku południową Europę.  Politycznie wiadomo że nasi wielmożni politycy już kolejny rok cackają się z tą bandą terrorystów, którzy stworzyli sobie państwo kalifatu. Oto co może się stać, jeżeli kalifat będzie sobie swobodnie hasał. Rzecz jasna gra jest mocno przejaskrawiona bo jakoś wierzyć mi się nie chce że nawet tacy politycy UE jak Merkel czy Tusk pzowolą na to by do brzegów Włoch płynęło setki barek z uzbrojonymi terrorystami oraz pontonów z bojownikami. Istny D-Day w wykonaniu terroryzmu. Gdzie flota morska, która spokojnie by to zablokowała? Z drugiej strony, patrząc na politykę otwartych granic..  Co tu gadać. Walisz z karabinu do pontonów z muzlimami z ISIS... to już jest piękne nawiązanie do aktualnej sytuacji geopolitycznej. Chłopaki z Destructive Creatiions znowu poszaleli. Gra śmika na UE4, d...y nie urywa ale efekty są bardzo ładne, wraki statków, samochodów urozmaicają pobojowisko, budynki się rozsypują a terrorysta rozwrywamy kończyny, aczkolwiek nie nacieszymy się tym efektem zbyt długo bo na ekranie dzieje sie zbyt dużo. Szkoda tylko że w tej grze nie da się wygrac. Zasada jest tylko taka by jak nadłużej przetrwać. Czyżby aluzja do tego że przegrywamy z imigracją islamskich terrorystów?

Plusy:
+Luźne nawiązanie do aktualnego problemu geopolitycznego w bliskim wschodzie i w Europie
+Rozpierducha, jucha i tysiące terrorystów do ubicia
+Nawet fajny klimacik
+Prosta z założenia
+Tania

Minusy:
-Grafika nie powala ale to nie symulator podziwiania tekstur tylko rozwałki :)
-Nie ma dobego zakończenia :(
-Tyko 4 mapy ale i tak chce sie na chwilę wpaść i 10 minut postrzelać
-Mało typów przeciwników

Widzisz czarną flagę Państwa Islamskiego? Celuj w trzymającego ją terrorystę i mocno ściskaj spust... W końcu mamy grę, która jasno pokazuje jak sobie poradzić z fala terroryzmu w Europie :) 8/10

35174846.review:
[h1]actually VERY politically correct (really!), and boring after an hour[/h1]
Yes, the guys who made Hatred (the awful game about a spree shooter who actually has to KICK most people to death to save his few bullets for the cops) ripped off that old Beachhead arcade game where you fire from a stationary turret at invading soldiers landing on the beach, except the enemies are members of Islamic State so the game is SUPER edgy and politically incorrect, right? Wrong.

IS Defense does exactly two "edgy" things - there are suicide bomber enemies (and not weird scifi ones like in R6 Siege) and some enemies carry ISIS' flag. That's IT. The opening movie mentions the real life fact that ISIS *renamed* their organization to "Islamic State" (i.e. note the crucial distinction that the devs are just saying what "IS" stands for, and do NOT actually identify IS as Islamic, even though they factually are) and they declared a caliphate. In the ridiculous dystopian future of the game (which is set in 2020) IS has taken over all of northern Africa, but it takes pains to claim that the locals were all forced to support IS (i.e. there is no mention of Muslims voluntarily joining IS).

The guys you're shooting are never identified as Muslims.

I'm pretty sure the words "jihad" and "Allah" are never used!

You never even get a good look at the enemy soldiers' faces.

There is no gore - the only satisfying kill is when you blow up a truck (which takes a STUPID number of bullets) and the jihadists all go flying as ragdolls.

The enemies never ululate (that high-pitched trilling "la la la la!" noise that terrorists like to do)

You don't get to rescue gays that IS was going to execute.

I'm pretty sure you never get to kill any camels. (Even Metal Slug had camels!)

There's tons of upgrades (which you NEED to grind for to have any chance of beating the later levels) but nothing offensive - you don't get to upgrade to bacon bullets to do extra damage. You can buy bacon bullets in REAL LIFE, but not in a game about killing thousands of Islamists. Lame.

34967799.review:
I bought this game ages ago basically because it was a game about blowing the crap out of IS. I never played it until today because frankly I wasn't expecting much.

I was wrong.

This game is actually pretty damn good. Obviously it's not an in-depth immersive experience but for what it is it is genuinely a hell of a lot of fun. The skill tree and special abilities really make the gameplay more involved than just 'aim-shoot-repeat'. Some of the abilities are milestones that make the game 10x easier (increased fire rate, no reload etc.). Personally I find it a shame that they allowed 360 movement to become unlocked as it kind of removes the entire Q/E yaw functionality but it does allow for more brutal, fast-paced meat-grinding which is pretty much this game's selling point.

While I would have liked some humor in the mix to spice up the enjoyment factor, for example suicide bombers shouting "Allahu akbar!" as they ran at you, I understand that this may have wound up with some offended parties.

All in all a surprising little gem that delivers some solid fun while not trying to be anything more than it is. For added amusement make sure to click on this link before playing: http://www.youtubeonrepeat.com/watch/?v=MGQaH3-LK54

34962599.review:
已经挺长时间没有抢滩登陆类型的游戏了，所以这个也算是可以对付一下的。
游戏玩法和抢滩登陆没啥区别，可以叫各种各样的支援，可以升级武器，还有无穷无尽的恐怖分子可供轰杀至渣。游戏的结局就是靠歼灭敌人数来达成的，杀够数就通关。难度方面，刚开始没有各种升级的时候武器火力不够，需要频繁的换弹，而且还得靠Q,E来回转动炮台，而且叫来的支援也是各种水，然而一旦升级满了之后游戏变无聊的速度就更快了……坚持个5、6分钟左右基本上就是一直按住鼠标左键，疯狂呼叫火力支援（因为敌人太多，不大会儿就能补充满火力支援条），敌人的种类也不算多（拿枪的，自爆的，小皮卡，悍马，各种登陆艇，最后一关还有自爆小汽车），能用的主武器也就是一挺机枪（好歹升级了给变个加特林之类的也好啊）。
总而言之，偶尔拿来泄愤其实还是可以的，不过乐趣基本上也就在你打通最后一关解锁所有升级之后到头了。作为小品级游戏的质量还是可以的，而且还有卡……推荐打折或者跟包一起买。

34367755.review:
This game is basically an on-rails shooter in which you mow down thousands upon thousands of ISIS' fanatical supporters using your trusty mounted turret and rocket launcher, staying alive as long as you can before your eventual death. The level of attention to detail in some of the maps for a game like this is quite impressive, just like in Destructive Creations' other, [i]slightly[/i] contoversial game Hatred.

Really the only area the game falls short in is variation; you sit back on your turret fighting an endless wave of repetitive enemies, using the same weapons and the same support requests like supply drops and allied soldiers. The enemy types basically consist of troopers, suicide bombers, trucks and military jeeps.

Other than that, not much is bad. The graphics are awesome. There is a skill tree with a couple of useful improvements and additional abilities to choose from for completionists. For extra chaos, you can set the corpse limit to 'unlimited' in the gameplay settings.

The last thing I want to say is that I think this game gets a [i]bit[/i] of hate for being 'controversial', with all the ISIS fanatics and such. It may not be much, but it is there. To these people, all I have to say is that everything is okay, we have some anal cream that we can use to soothe the pain of the salt. It's a game for christ's sake. Grow up. Also, it's not like you're killing humans, they're only terrorists.

34223760.review:
IS Defence is a turret-defence game: 
you sit in a immobile turret and shoot waves of enemies untill you are overwhelmed or you beat all the waves.
Your arsenal includes a machine gun, a lead-pipe that the game calls "rocket launcer" and 5 different specials (supply drop, infantry squad, artillery strike, bombing run and a attack chopper).
All of these (and your health) can be upgraded into more powerful variants and I must give the game some credit for making some the upgrades visual (for example the infinite clip changes the box clip on the machine gun into a belt feeder).

The biggest problem of the game has to be its blandness, especially on the enemies: there are just 5 different kinds of them.
A dude with a assault-rifle, dude with a suicide-vest, a pick-up truck with a machine gun, a Humvee with a machine gun turret and a suicide mini-van.
In a good turret defence game there would also be some mini-bosses scattered about to add some excitement and feel of progress into the waves.
The game also lacks bosses: there are no attack blimps (or in this case "terror blimps"), mega-tanks or mecha-terrorists. There isn't even a end boss, just a short ending cut-scene even though coming up with a end boss to a game called "IS Defence" should be the easiest task in the world(no ISIS-BOT 3000, really? shame on you Destructive Creations).
This makes getting through the waves more of a task than entertainment as firing at endless mass of similar looking enemies gets boring really quickly(and according to the achivements each level is atleast 20 minutes long).
Luckily you don't need to complete each level to unlock the next one: just kill enough badguys and blow up enough vehicles and you can proceed.
The levels aren't very imaginative but luckily there aren't many of them: 3 levels near a beach and one level in a "desert" that is covered in vegetation.

In conclution: IS Defence has no redeeming qualities.
It is short, un-imaginative and boring. 
If you want a good turret defence game, try Toy Soldiers instead: It shines on every area that IS Defence is lacking.

33712682.review:
Long ago, across an ocean, when I was but a Seamen in the Navy, my Petty Officer in Charge used to play Beachhead in his barracks room.

Late at night, his voice would carry in the still air, screaming curses at his computer screen. His colorful language punctuated by the drone of computer generated machine gun fire and explosions.

I don't know how many times he fantasized that the pixelated enemies were a particular someone that he had to deal with on a daily basis, but I BELIEVE that game kept him from snapping completely.

Now, it's 2017, and when I saw this game I knew I had to get it, to carry on the tradition. At first, I just lol'd. But then, after coming home from a particularly rough day, I fired up IS Defense and lost myself into the deep narrative. 

Before I knew it, I was seeing my boss on the screen, racing towards my machine gun, yelling about quality testing products that weren't even prototyped yet. His explosion sent waves of ecstasy through my body.

On the left, the hateful HR rep, only working part time, and trying to push all of her job off onto anyone that would stand still long enough to accept it. The rocket to her face was exquisite.

Sneak attack! My lazy apprentice that can't show up on time and hasn't even learned the basics of how to use a computer, rushed my position and blew up in my face. I'm hurt, but still alive. And there's a health pack around here somewhere.

10/10, would spiritually reconnect with my old supervisor over a spiritual sequel to a game that kept him from killing me.

33073016.review:
A simple, action-packed, stationary-FPS, [b]IS Defense[/b] is all about destroying waves of ISIS fighters. Why? Because who gives a flying f**k about ISIS anyways? :D

Here is my review for the game:

[h1] Background [/h1]
You operate a stationary position armed with a machine gun and a rocket launcher. Your mission is simple: Defending your position from endless waves of ISIS fighters, attacking you with ground troops ([b]suicide bombers[/b] included), fast-attack vehicles armed with machine guns, as well as Zodiac boats and landing crafts which deploy enemies in missions with beachheads.

While defending your position, continuously killing enemies grants you Skill Points, with them you can upgrade you skills, from weapons to reinforcements and fire support.

Also, you get the option to call in 5 different assets:
1. [b] Cargo Plane [b/] - a C-130 randomly drops 2 crates of either extra health or extra rockets, sometimes both of them.
2. [b] Infantry Support [/b] - a squad of 8 riflemen to assist you with the fighting. You can call the infantry squads as many times as you like. Friendly fire is on, so don't kill your own guys :P
3. [b] Artillery [/b] - fire mission of artillery shells dropping on the battlefield for a short period of time.
4. [b] Airstrike [/b] - ultimately the best asset against large presence of enemies which you can't fend off, a group of 3 F-16s will drop bombs across the battlefield.
5. [b] Attack Helicopter [/b] - an Apache attack helicopter is deployed above the battlefield, killing the enemies from anywhere they come.

The game includes 4 missions with each one is unlocked by killing a specific amount of ground troops and vehicles in the previous mission in order to advance.

[h1] The Good [/h1]
If you really want some anger relief, this is one of the games that actually does that. With the amount of endless action and enemy waves, also being ISIS... Just sit back, relax, have a cold drink, a snack, and never raise your finger from the fire button.

[h1] The Neutral [/h1]
While the game is described by the developers as a side-project, don't expect to get a [b]Call of Duty[/b]-style fast-paced gameplay or a NASA-super-computer graphics and effects. Though released in 2016, the graphics and special effects are mediocre, but not alarming enough to make you regret it. It's not the graphics that you should worry about!

[h1] The Bad [/h1]
While I really like this game, after buying it during the Steam Summer Sale in -50% for just 2.99$, I played for about 3.5 hours straight and completed every mission and unlocking every upgrade. The game is relatively short, also not very much challenging as soon as you completely upgrade you skills.

Something else that disappointing me is the minimally variety of enemies to kill. No, I didn't expect a building-sized MECHs, but maybe some tanks, APCs, etc. Your own support is also minimally attractive. After calling-in the infantry squads a few times, I expected to get also some friendly vehicles to add a little more taste to the battlefield. The helicopter wasn't enough for me, to be honest... :(

The game would also be great if it had cooperative feature. What is better than killing ISIS with your friends?

[h1] Final Verdict Score: [b] 7.5/10 [/b] [/h1]
Personally I wasn't disappointed [u] entirely [/u] from the game. I will keep playing it, as well as recommend it to other people. Too bad it's a bit repetitive, but oh well... Still fun as hell :D

32132303.review:
[h1]Short version: 70%[/h1]
Putting all political overtones aside, IS Defense is a decent turret shooter that looks beautiful, but lacks shelf life since it has next to no actual variety in enemies or stages.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
For starters, let us get the obvious out of the way: yes, this is a game about an imaginary future, where the Islamic State invades Europe with a rag-tag army, and our job is to shoot an endless numbers of Arabic terrorists. Then again, pretty much every shooter since Wolfenstein 3D features a specific group of people as the entire enemy force, so it is not as if this game stands out of the crowd.

So, is IS Defense any good? Yes, but not for a long while. Genre-wise, it is a stationary turret shooter—the game type that is usually a short mandatory minigame in most modern FPSs. Since it only has four stages with two foot soldier and three vehicle enemy types, it is not exactly a poster child of variety.

Granted, those four stages will last a while, since this game has quite the difficulty curve. Each level requires you to kill a certain amount of enemies (accumulatively), but their swarm gets uncontrollable barely after a minute or so.
This is where the upgrade system comes into play. You can upgrade your health, main gun, sub-weapon, and the various support powers. The problem with this system is that the player is initially too weak to do anything, but later, with proper upgrades, it takes an almost continuous stream of enemies to drop your health. Sure, this means that dedicated players can reach ridiculous scores, but most may get bored by endlessly repeating the same four stages to get that far.

《9-123》你们要讨伐临近你们的不信道者，使他们感觉到你们的严厉。你们知道，真主是和克己者在一起的。

《47-4》你们在战场上遇到不信道者的时候，应当斩杀他们，你们既战胜他们，就应当俘虏他们。……

[h1]他们来了，他们驾驶着武装皮卡，穿着自杀背心，拿着卡拉什尼科夫步枪，来进攻我们了。

那么我们能做的，还有什么呢？坐以待毙被砍头还是慌乱逃窜被射杀？不，我们不想这样。

给你的M240装上一满箱的子弹。

给你的火箭筒准备上足够炸平滩头的火箭。

调好你的无线电频道，让你的炮兵和空军战友随时可以为你血洗前线。

然后，让这些恶魔进入你的射程，并且替他们祈祷。之后，扣下扳机。

在机枪的扫射和炸弹的起爆声中，恶魔们的肉身将会消逝，而灵魂会升及天国，见到他们的真主。

至于他们的真主是会赐给他们七十二个处女，还是会羞愤地挨个抽他们耳光，那想必就不是我们这些不信者需要关注的范畴了。[/h1]

————————

由于可笑的“政治正确”原因，本作的Meta评分只有可怜的50分，使得本作的品质在主流玩家中被极大地低估。事实上这个情况也恰恰反映了西方国家在面对伊斯兰极端宗教势力和ISIS崛起时的鸵鸟心态——当然，他们的鸵鸟心态和政治圣母也不仅表现在这一处，只不过这一处是相对比较可笑的地方罢了。

剧情：2020年，IS的势力已经庞大到吞并了整个北非，而借此为跳板，IS开始向地中海北部的富庶之地——西欧，发起了进攻。上百万武装分子咆哮着冲上地中海沿岸的欧洲各国海岸，誓要把欧洲变成真主统治下的领地。玩家，则是身处欧洲南岸防线的一名机枪兵，你要做的，就是在你流干最后一滴血之前，用你手里的机枪和火箭筒尽可能多地送这些武装分子去见他们的真主。对于游戏圈来说，伊斯兰极端宗教势力和ISIS，一直都是一个不可轻易碰触的雷区，而本作开发商Destructive Creations不仅敢于顶着压力着手于此类题材，更直接而尖锐地描绘了IS坐大之后与文明世界爆发的血腥冲突，对于一直在此方面持绥靖姑息政策的西方各国，其实是一个相当直白的警示。不过，对于游戏所宣扬的以暴制暴的思想是否合适，这一问题就要见仁见智了。
评价：7/10

图像和音效：抛开富有争议性的题材不谈，本作拥有同类作品（塔防FPS）中出类拔萃的画质，尤其有着极其绚丽狂乱的爆炸特效和烟尘特效。由于玩家的固定视角限制，游戏过程中并不能随心所欲地观看四周的美景，但也正因如此而使得以低成本开发高画质成为可能。尤其值得表扬的是本作的各种3D模型，尽管在游戏中玩家并不太可能有机会近观，但大多数模型（人类，载具）都有着比较高的完成度。不过，本作的物理效果略感不足，游戏中时常会发生死亡人物单臂撑地而不倒的场景，以及一些其他因物理碰撞而导致的小BUG，幸而玩家视野的限制使得这类问题没有影响游戏本身的乐趣。音乐和音效方面，本作在音效上表现平平，唯有机枪的操作声略显质感和饱满，而音乐则十分热血澎湃，和游戏本身相当合拍，令人满意。
评价：8/10

上手性和可玩性：自从抢滩登陆战系列开创了塔防FPS的原点之后，这一类游戏的操作几乎就不曾变过。而本作突破性地大幅加强了键盘在游戏过程中的地位，使得原本一鼠走天下的套路不再奏效，也给本作的水准和难度提升了一个台阶。但整体而言，本作在当下的游戏大中小作里仍属于容易上手的类型。游戏内容方面，本作在射击手感和场景设计上下足了功夫，但却输在了后期的关卡设计上。主角的能力太过于依赖后期升上去的技能导致前期的难度过于偏高，且敌方载具设计得过强，使得游戏前期在掌握打法之前举步维艰。幸而由于本作的基础扎实，频繁的败退并不会给玩家带来太多的挫败感，反而会成为越挫越勇的动力。游戏内引入了排行榜的设计，使得原本单调无趣的本作多了些重复游玩的意义。
评价：7.5/10

配置要求：高水平的画质不可避免地会导致高配置要求水准。本作的最低要求配置（Core i5-750+4GB+GTX460/HD5850）在同类作品的横向对比里确实属于偏高（尽管在当前主流中只算中低要求），而推荐配置要求更使得相当一批轻度玩家的古董电脑和本作无缘。想享受本作而电脑又很久不曾更新过硬件的玩家，还是赶紧更新下吧。
评价：6.5/10

其他：
[list]
 [*][strike]不[/strike]清真。加分。
 [*]无脑屠杀的爽快。加分。
 [*]GUI设计比较赏心悦目。加分。
 [*]射击手感还算很不错的。加分。
 [*]四个场景各有不同，在同类作品中很丰富。加分。
 [*]支持MOD。加分。
 [*]武器种类偏少，尤其缺乏爆炸性武器。减分。
 [*]对新玩家略欠友好，建议增加初级关卡和难度选择。减分。
 [*]有些新增元素比较多余（比如键盘控制碉堡基座左右转）。减分。
 [*]武装分子目标相对偏小难以靠机枪击中，需要略作练习。减分。
 [*]支援玩家的我方小兵AI实在感人，而且无法由玩家指挥。减分。
[/list]
[h1]总结：一款质量相当高的塔防FPS游戏，很好地完成了填补同类游戏大空白的任务，且有着贴切现实的题材切入点，是中小规模商业游戏的一个好范例。

推荐度：★★★★/★★★★★（很推荐）

“Love from Manchester.”[/h1]

31933431.review:
"Destructive Creations znowu szokuje", "kolejna kontrowersyjna gra twórców Hatred", "IS Defense to islamofobia".
Takie hasła pojawiały się w okolicach pierwszej zapowiedzi i premiery tej gry, która zresztą nastąpiła niedługo później. Zupełnie ich nie rozumiem bo do terrorystów w grach strzela się przecież od lat. Chodzi o to, że IS, w odróżnieniu do np. Talibów, w swojej nazwie ma jednoznaczne odniesienie do religii, którą reprezentuje? Przecież nie wcielamy się tu w terrorystę odcinającego głowy amerykańskich żołnierzy, ani nawet nie strzelamy do Amerykanów/Europejczyków jak np. w bardziej kontrowersyjnym Medal of Honor z 2010 roku.

Tak czy siak, mając dziwaczny kontekst w jakim wychodziła ta gra przed sobą, przejdźmy do recenzji. IS Defense to prościusieńka statyczna strzelanka w typie tak zwanych "celowniczów", jakich na początkach swojej kariery City Interactive (CI Games) produkowało na pęczki. Z tą różnicą, że IS Defense jest satysfakcjonujące jak żadna inna gra tego typu. Otóż gracz obsługując statyczne działko, może jedynie obracać je wokół własnej osi, celować i strzelać. Tyle. Brzmi nudno, nie? Ale potrafi wciągnąć, zwłaszcza jeśli polujesz na achievementy. Gra oferuje również rankingi społeczności, przyznam, że w jednej z plansz złapałem się na tym, że wyświetlająca się w prawym górnym rogu obecna pozycja w rankingu (plus nicki użytkowników) motywowały mnie do podwojenia swoich wysiłków. Co znamienne, rozgrywka nie jest tak durna jakby się mogło z początku wydawać. Przeciwnicy pojawiają się wprawdzie losowo, ale w pewnych sekwencjach, które gracz powinien w pewien sposób wyczuć i skontrować. Byłoby to karkołomne zadanie, gdyby musiał sobie radzić samym działkiem, nie? Mamy więc możliwość wezwania piechoty lub śmigłowca bojowego, które pomogą nam z piechotą i pojazdami wroga, nalot bombowców lub artylerię, których używamy gdy ilość wrogich jednostek staje się byt przytłaczająca. Ponad to mamy możliwość odblokowania ulepszeń do działka. Po uzbieraniu odpowiedniej ilości punktów doświadczenia możemy odblokować po kilka umiejętności z trzech drzewek. Gdy już wszystko odblokujemy, czujemy się jak prawdziwy koks. Przetrwanie ponad 20 minut na ostatniej planszy (najtrudniejszej moim zdaniem) jest bardzo satysfakcjonujące. A propos plansz, tych jest niestety tylko 4, ale nie sądzę by była to jakaś wielka wada w grze za 5,24€. IS Defense napędza silnik Unreal 4, i to widać. Jest pięknie. Zwłaszcza podobają mi się efekty wybuchów, którymi gra zresztą chwali się przy każdej okazji, gdy tych jest wystarczająco dużo, w spektakularny sposób spowalniany jest czas, byśmy mogli nacieszyć się spowodowaną przez nas destrukcją. Muzyka i udźwiękowienie stoją na bardzo wysokim poziomie. Nie ma się do czego przyczepić, no może poza tym, ze soundtrack to max. 2-3 kawałki.

Podsumowując: Bardzo przyjemny "celowniczek", idealny na chwilę relaksu. Zabijanie fanatyków religijnych dawno nie było takie niezobowiązująco beztroskie i satysfakcjonujące.

31889680.review:
If you enjoy the stand-up arcade shooters at Boondocks, Dave & Busters, Chuk-E-Cheese, etc, Like Aliens, Rambo, The Terminator, then you will probably enjoy this game. 

Running on Ultra everything, AMD FX-8350, RADEON RX-480 8GB, DDR3 8GB, managing a steady 60FPS and the game looks great in 1080p. 

Skill Tree, "semi" static mounted MG/Rocket Launcher turret with about 120deg rotation, several support options. You get to shoot, blast and wreak general havoc on "ISIS". Only $5.99. Worth it IMO.

31886627.review:
The genre speaks for itself, you're in one place you shoot the Islamic state blah blah blah that doesnt need explaining.

I have one huge gripe with how the game plays and that's RNjesus, somtimes you will have a good run and the game only sends what you can handle at one time at you. Somtimes all at once they will send so many vehicles that you will die and there is nothing you can do, this feels like a terrible and lazy way to implement difficulty in a game and really should be tweeked a little bit. Not to mention all of the "kill streaks" you earn and can unleash on your enemies are garbage except the first two, infantry and supply drops. 

Still a very fun filler type of game where you can just pick it up shoot some baddies and have a good ol' time.  The progression with skill points and "leveling up" is a really nice way to keep you going wanting to become OP and trust me you will need it. Destructive Creations knows whats up making satisfying violent games for pretty cheap so its definetly worth supporting them as developers.

31793626.review:
This game is the exact reminesce of the old Beach Head machine gunner games you would play as a kid in the Arcades. Arcades are endangered nowadays, but this helps to achieve those nostalgic times! 

Despite it being nearly exactly the same, the graphics are hugely better, the sound fx and visuals are awesome, the amount of stuff on the screen at once is amazing and it definitely is a stress reliever. Having experience skill trees keeps the replayability (albeit maybe only 5 hours of game time to unlock all of it) and with mods available, this game definitely makes it worth buying for only $5.99. A lot of devs try to milk as much as they can out of the games with little to offer. This is a full experience of turret toting ISIS killing badassery.

Of course, you see everything the game has to offer almost off the bat, there is still a fun factor here that is well lived.

We all know that bit in FPS games where you jump in a gun turret or machine gun post and hose down masses of the advancing enemy, well this whole game is that part.  So great fun.  

I did have some problems with the realism though.  For a start, none of the enemy shout "Allan's Snackbar!" as they advance.  

Secondly, the enemy did not run away when faced with armed opposition.  That is normally what happens with this particular enemy.  They are only brave when up against civilians, children, hostages, and unarmed soldiers who are tied up.  When they see anyone else they flee in terror.  

It would have added extra realism if, not only did they flee, but they dressed up (badly) as women, being too dim to work out that women don't have beards and their disguise is fooling nobody.

Apart from that it's great fun and I recommend it.

Aside from the context of the game, there isn't much to say about IS Defense as this is a very basic horde game where you're planted on a mounted LMG that can rotate 360 degrees and survive as long as you can from the onslaught of terrorists coming your way. After a certain amount of kills, you gain a skill point to invest into a progressive skill tree that will remain upgraded for your future runs. There are only 4 maps in the entire game that are locked from play until you reach a certain amount of total kills for that specific map. I noticed that there is a workshop for this game, but ever since launch, there is only one entry on the workshop with no additional entries from anybody else so basically it's like the workshop doesn't exist. Is it any good? Yeah, it's pretty good as one of those games where if you're having a bad day for whatever reason, you can boot this up and just have a blast, kind of like how games like Stardew Valley or Slime Ranchers relieves some stress I had prior to playing a session, only IS Defense is a more violent alternative.

Now get out there, mount that LMG, shoot some terrorists, and most importantly, make Lord Tachanka proud. {-}7

It does expand the genre slightly by being able to rotate 360 degrees (and thus attacks from all directions), but does also limit it by not including attacking aircraft.

If you can get past the rather controversial subject matter, you'll find a very fast paced shooter, with good graphics.

You may not be playing it for hours on end, but playing every so often is just right for this type of game.

30949260.review:
Turn off your brain and start shooting like a mad-man.


It is your classic sentry gun shooter, enemies everywhere, explosions and death as your crossheir like some mark of doom straves over the slime of humanity, daesh.

You can hear them scream, just shoot them, or if you are the more refined killer, aim on their heads and shoot it off, burn them alive with your unlockable icendiary missiles, or just blow them up yourself or have them blow up by artillery, missile wielding choppers or just the good ol' napalm airstrike.

You'll start off a little weak, but no fear, you'll rise up to the level of almighty god soon enough... by far greater than whatever imaginary deity is leading these poor, hapless daesh fellows to you.

The good:
+++ Brain off, start shooting.  It starts up quickly, runs smoothly, no quests or thinking required, just chill and shoot
+++ You have to play to get the unlocks... it's a cheap trick to make you play, and it works.  You are always eager to get yet another upgrade. It takes some effort, but not much 

++ the graphics are pretty good. Not AAA, but decent

+ the sound is sufficient.  Some attention was made to have the first few moments bring a moment of peace and quite... hearing the birds or a gentle flare being fired

+ flank attacks are nice 

The bad:

- feels to have a wrong scope.  I don't know why, but I don't feel sentry guns should turn 360*.  The flank attacks are nice, as said but idk, it seemed better to have the rest my back is covered.  Also, it would have liked to see the enemies requiring more time to actuallly run to you... make them storm you if needed, but.... you know.. have you ever played medal of honor, the beach level, where you could be the gunner in one of the towers in multiplayer?  That specific kick is not received here.

---- Some epic encounters could be implemented... Maybe some boss, like Al Baghdadi showing up and when you kill him, he rises up as a monster to take out.  Now it's always the same 5 enemies (2 soldier, 3 vehicles) and that is it.

But, overall, this is thumbs up.  I'll probably play it from time to time, when I don't have that much time but still want some casual gaming

30578512.review: This is really well done. I cant explain how satisfying this is. I have a soft spot for on-rails shooters. They are great platform to either fully utilize a good idea or even tell a rolling story. The latter would be Blue Estate. That uses the rails to progress the story and uses camera angles and movements to challenge the player. The former - the use of this as a platform to build a simple-form game around - like IS Defense, is very easy to get wrong. Everyone who plays an on-rails shooter always thinks "I could make this". No you cant. Your ideas are probably terrible. IS Defense has a very simple "active" tasks setup. You shoot, call in infantry, supplies, air strikes, et al. But its done in a progression system so you need to use certain tactics sparingly and at the right times. Under the action is a character upgrade system that is simple; Upgrades are noticeably helpful upon re-entering the game. If you dont buy this game then you love ISIS. And if you love them that much then you should move to areas where they already rule. Like The Netherlands or France.

More maps (as there are only four) some annoying bugs in the game to be fixed like health boxes that are not destroyable when they fall through the map.  Maybe more guns/skills ore even perks to improve and spice up the combat. Despite this I enjoyed the gameplay (even though there was little amount of it) and would buy and play it again.

An A-grade, premium Kebab removal [strike]fantasy[/strike] simulator. It will take about two hours to fully upgrade your airstrikes with napalm, helicopters with missiles, and every other tool at your disposal to exterminate the people of the mud, at which point you would have finished the 4 missions and can aim for a high score and the achivements. You probably won't reach it though, as I had reached 2:34:33 on the second mission before I had had enough, and only got to #13th global ranking.

Theres enough content and grind to level up while remaining interesting and fun. Learning the best strategies, and when and which support ordinances to use makes for efficient and destructive gameplay.

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bSDb8pD6sno]Kebab Removal Music[/url] is recommended.

Definitely worth full price.

29468586.review:
Ein weiteres Spiel von Destructive Creations...diesmal auf nem MG Turm. Tower Defence Spiele sind normalerweise tot, deshalb wunderte ich mich das DC dieses relativ veraltete Genre wieder aufwärmen will. Ich wollte nach dem Trailer mehr sehen und stürzte mich ins Geballer, denn das wird bei dem Vertreter endlos geboten.

Ein nicht zu umfangreiches Upgrade System ermöglicht das Auftrüsten meines Turms, und das ist bitter nötig um nach 5min noch am Leben zu sein. Zusätzlich kann ich Unterstützung anfordern in Form von Truppen, Munition und Health sowie Artillerie, Helikopter und Bombardierung des gesamten Areals. Die Sounduntermalung ist richtig gut, ob Musik oder Effekte man ist mittendrin.

Aber das war es auch schon. Endlosen Gegnerwellen trotzen und so lange wie möglich durchhalten ist das einzige Ziel. Mir persönlich waren es auch zuwenig Maps zur Auswahl. DC hat zwar später noch 1 Karte nachgelegt, aber 4 Karten sind für ein Tower Defence Spiel zuwenig.

29407748.review:
I came into this game with fond memories of Beach Head Desert War in mind. I expected this game to be like that. I was unfortunately disappointed. After about a few minutes into the game, you've encountered almost all the enemies it has to offer. There's the standard rifleman, the suicide bomber, the rocket launcher guy, the technical, the humvee (which is just a more armored up version of the technical), and the car bomb. There are also transport ships on the first two levels, but they don't really count as they aren't much of a threat. Beach Head, on the other hand, had enemies like tanks, planes dropping paratroopers, and attack helicopters which made the game much more exciting. The game also requires that you complete certain objectives on each map before you can move onto the next, and since you're unlikely to finish them on your first try, you'll be playing the same mission for a while. This combined with the aforementioned small enemy roster makes the game get dull quick.

[h1]Summary[/h1]
Too few enemies and repetitive missions make this game get boring fast.

29093170.review:
One of the best On-Rails Shooter games I've ever played! 

IS Defense is an oldschool arcade game with simple mechanics, basically you are a stationary gunner and you have to defend certain hostile environments and kill as many Islamic State crazies as long as possible. The game has more depth than I expected (you have to time your calls for supply / health drops and infantry support if you want to survive and you get promotion points to upgrade your health, weapons or support options). 

The graphics are fantastic (game is running on the Unreal Engine) so killing those barbaric goat loving Islamic State imbeciles never felt and looked as good as in IS Defense. As a bonus sometimes the slow motion bullet-time effect activates. Same goes for the audio: it's loud, raw and has a lot of umpf and makes the situation you find yourself in far more intense!

IS Defense is not an expensive game (around € 5), there are only 4 maps in the base game,  however it's so much fun a DLC and/or more maps and scenarios would be most welcome, especially since the game comes with support for MODs!

If you like the On-Rails Shooter genre this game is an absolute must have! 

10/10 stars. Fun as hell.

28969027.review:
It's always great when you're interested in a game solely for the comedy its premise provides at face value, only to play the thing and become impressed by its own merits.

The idea of ISIS rising up and storming Europe seemed like a novel, perhaps even absurd, concept for a game; however, the developers behind the now-infamous "Hatred" made it work. Terrorists are right up there with Nazis (thanks, Wolfenstein) on the list of enemies you can't feel bad about murdering in cold blood. Hell, you could remove the terrorists from the equation, replace them with ravenous panda bears, and this would still be a fun game. IS Defense is a member of a dying genre of first-person shooters: the "shooting gallery." I've seen this genre most prevalently in arcades, and by Ysmir, IS Defense would've cleared my pocket of quarters if it were in an arcade. Like other games in the genre, you are placed in a stationary position behind a machine gun and tasked with mowing down the frothing hordes of enemies charging at you from the beachhead. Though it may sound simple, things can quickly get hectic and out of hand, with terrorists swarming your encampment from every imaginable angle. Fortunately, IS Defense also boasts a progression system for your character, gun turret, rocket launcher, and support calls. The more terrorists you mow down, the more points you can put into the system, and, in turn, the more terrorists you can mow down. As the bodycount rises, you'll be able to unlock additional maps on which to indulge the game's feedback loop of killing and progression. Really, that's all there is to be said about IS Defense.

In all, IS Defense is a simple game: shoot, kill, die, repeat. The experience can get somewhat repetitive after a while, but the game is something that is best enjoyed in short bursts. At this price point, the game is certainly worth it.

Small addendum: I don't know if it has to do with my settings, my rig, the game's optimization, or a combination of those three, but the framerate can become downright abhorrent at times.

28791844.review:
This is actually a pretty good game! You have to survive as long as possible whilst eliminating the scourge that is the Islamic State.

There are four maps, with one unlocked at the beginning and the rest unlocked as you reach certain milestones. There's an upgrade path for your skills to spice things up a little bit. You also have an assortment of support skills that you can use after scoring enough points. You can also rotate your turret, so it's a 360 degree defense game.

The presentation is quite good. The game looks really pretty, runs extremely well and loads quickly. A lot of stuff happens during a run and the game never seems to slow down even a bit.

The game even has mod support, though sadly there are hardly any mods for it...

Definitely recommended, especially if you want to vent some stress and/or listen to some podcast.

28670052.review:
[h1]蒸汽社区游戏自定义功能（mods）已经实装（反正我是刚发现的），一个是“退化防御（Degeneracy Defense）”，画面略有不同，大叫着蜂拥而来的是窑沉，小厮，圆哩，婇犺蛹，罩倭，巾腥等等著名小清新民主人士，“上蒂赐我一个给搂孩子”，“夷撕烂是呵蛢鬃蕉”这样的标语在虵/它们手中挥舞；另一个mod是“克拉克西分队-川普王2016”，主界面有著名的教徒肏山羊的描绘，召唤的友军和其发射的子弹造型奇特，背景音乐更是相当邪门。两个mod各自有一个0进度存档，也就是说之前的能力装备解锁是不能继承的，除了不能用来解锁成就，整体和原版夷撕烂国防御大同小异，但明显更加喜感，新的解锁过程不会太枯燥（如果再有社区mod，我是不太想再次解锁一整遍了。）。两个mod都可以在此游戏的社区中通过“订阅”来激活下载，进游戏后从mods选项里选择并运行就能把玩了。这一段是补充的对mods的评价。[/h1]
画面80分，配色过关，近远景中规中矩，对得起定位和价格，还略有惊喜。
音效90分，音乐很激昂，有渲染力（有些旋律让人想起MW2等游戏），人物配音中规中矩，像这么回事。
游戏性90分，仅凭反政治正确的精神加成是得不到目前96%的Steam好评率的，这游戏的确很好玩。
第一人称塔防RPG，相当于《抢滩》的续作，弹药飞行速度有限，需要考虑提前量，很真实，不需要考虑走位，爽快的对敌人开火就行，技能解锁系统简单直接而且有效，只要操作不是很差，很容易产生“再玩一会”的念头。缺点在于武器系统不够丰富，敌人种类不够多样，关卡内容总体较单一。
补充：全成就全解锁通关了，系统显示用了12小时多，很好的游戏，能让我一次次尝试，屡败屡战的游戏不会差。
随便说说过关内容，第一关最简单，但初期在缺少足够解锁增强的情况下还是有难度的，随着增强的完善，达到坚持20分钟的难度也越来越低了。第二关的难点在于补给品容易被车辆撞到从而提前消耗，第三关最难，车辆貌似最多，不过很意外却是我最先得到20分钟成就的一关，后期有了大量陆战队员清理IS步兵后就可以专心对付悍马了，我的支援战术是只选择空投补给，陆战队员和武直，其实前三关都可以这样，尽量少用3和4号火力支援，因为炮兵和空袭火力可能波及到友军，敌人车辆会最多从两个方向来袭，当系统提示一侧有敌军时，先确认中间方向是不是剩下了一些车辆，如果这样进入一个良性循环，满地补给品和友军，其实不是太容易坚持不下去的，最后一关的要点在于用好炮火支援，F16突袭和阿帕奇，尽量别用陆战队员，这关有大量自爆步兵，炸弹车还有满楼的敌方火力，他们很难像前三关那样坚持很长时间，空格的导弹一发可以清理一个建筑的敌军，这样配合天赋树里的消灭敌人恢复的能力就可以少用很多补给（这个能力在前三关存在感并不强），用重火力覆盖战场，自己也就有机会了。
有些小问题：比如有些地图空投补给会显示在下方，不能打到；友军士兵不会躲爆炸和车辆，还可能会堵枪口；关卡中后期场面劲爆，可能会造成运行卡顿，这时候计时器也会跟着变慢，让人有“怎么还没到20分钟”的错觉，这个问题只能在优化和电脑配置上解决了；另外，如果主动结束一个关卡的游戏，坚持的时长是得不到记录的，我在第三关打了一个多小时，一口气把所有能力解锁了，20分钟成就也出来了，数据在游戏内却没有记录下来，让人有些不爽。在完全通关前，玩家只能在没有完成内置数据挑战的关卡中才能获得经验，不知道为什么要这么设定。如果能把天赋系统改一下，或者可以选择暂时关闭一些能力，或许更有挑战性。
模组内容还没有实装的样子，颇有些期待了。
故事99分，除了一叶障目的把那坨当作了正义一方，其他的没有问题。总体90分。剧情方面的内容详见下文。

明明是个有意思，有玩头，让人上瘾的好游戏，却因为“政治错误”被广大“主流西方媒体”黑成了50分的内容不足、“煽动仇恨和复仇”的“烂作”。白左三大爱：同，黑，绿是长江后浪推前浪，绿教率先表达了不安分，但却因为有白左存在，欧洲人还沉浸在开放民主的幻境中不能自拔（像不像台蛙？）。
来来来，尝尝我随手搜到的一段鸡汤：

[i]作者：Antoine Leiris
译者：Dr How
链接：丧妻法国人对恐怖分子的回应 - 没处答的一些话 - 纸糊专栏
来源：纸糊

《你们休想得到我的恨》

      周五晚上，我生命中一位特殊的女性被你们夺走了生命；那是我一生的挚爱，是我儿子的母亲。但你们休想得到我的恨。我不知你们是谁，也不想知道；你们是行尸走肉。你们为之滥杀无辜的那位神，祂若依自己的形象创造我们，那我妻子身上的每颗子弹都会在祂心上留下伤痕。
      所以，我不会乖乖向你奉上仇恨的大礼。虽然你们遍地寻仇，但我若以愤怒回击仇恨，便会堕落得和你们一样愚昧；正是这愚昧造就了今天的你们。你想让我恐惧，让我向同胞们投去不信任的目光，让我牺牲自由换取安全。你们输了！我们会继续正常生活！
      今早，经过几日几夜的等待，我终于见到了她。她和周五晚上离开时一样美丽，和十二年前我疯狂爱上她时一样动人。噩耗当然让我悲痛，我就让给你这小小的胜利，但不会长久。我知道她每天都和我们在一起，有一天我们将会在天堂相遇，那里属于自由的灵魂，不会向你们敞开大门。
      就剩我们俩了，儿子和我。但我们胜过世界上任何一支军队。Melvil午睡醒了，我要去照顾他，没多的时间浪费在你们身上了。他刚刚 17个月大，他会像往常一样吃点心，然后我们会像往常一样玩耍，这孩子将用一生的幸福和自由使你们蒙羞。因为，你们也休想得到他的恨，休想！[/i]

这觉悟！清真怪们虽然是玻璃心，但他们对你们的恨兴趣不大，他们只是想得到你们卡菲勒的子宫，让你们的Y染色体得不到延续而已（是AOE效果造成那些女性卡菲勒提前变成了他们真主的祭品）。如果真主的使者们给白左众基佬换了种，让那坨成为伊斯兰圣战组织的一部分，也就世界和平了罢？
[spoiler]也怪了，白左能给白帽贡献自己女人的生殖器官和选票，却不能对无神论者一视同仁，果然，伊斯兰教和基督教就像是一个游戏的1P和2P，一绿一蓝而已。
中国X族的分子人类学数据早就出来了，除了少数地区较特殊，总体父系基因和汉族基本一样，可怜的精神阿拉伯人，可怜的汉皮绿心马瓦里。可有个问题，他们被换了好几轮的种了，为什么他们的信仰还能得到保留呢？[/spoiler]
我平时比较推崇Metacritic的分数，但对这个游戏并不适用，因为这个分数过于政治化和片面。如果你反对川普所鄙视的政治正确，如果你是个无神论者或是非绿教洗脑者，不妨用行动支持一下这个游戏，而且，上面说了，这游戏也的确很好玩。

毕竟这类游戏现在没多少了，能玩到这款游戏挺庆幸的，加上题材非常与时俱进（“ISIS原来这么强”这种言论我是真的服气）。
感谢安利这款游戏的朋友。
-

28009241.review:
Turret defence where you mow down legions of jihadis for the sake of Europe.

Enemies come in a few varieties: regular infantrymen, technicals, armored HMMWVs, two kinds of landing boats and suicide bombers and cars.  It's your job to mow them down with upgradable weapons and unlockable power-ups.  Your objective as a player is to break score records, just like the good old times at arcades.

Graphics are rather nice, as the engine is the same as on Hatred, the studio's previous project.

A great breath of fresh air on an old and nearly forgotten game genre.  I get fond memories of Ryssän Kauhu (google it) while playing this.

And hey, you're mowing down countless Daesh barbarians.  That's the next best thing to wiping out nazies.  DEUS VULT!

27547780.review:
脳みそからっぽで遊べる楽しい固定機銃ゲーム。
敵がISなのは物議を醸しそうだがどうせゲームの的なんだし、この際アルカイダだろうがタリバーンだろうがどうだっていい。

序盤は物量の前に押しつぶされて結構辛いが、アップグレードを取っていくとかなり楽しくなってくる。
アップグレードを全部取ると、1発が2つに分かれて着弾と同時に爆発するリロード不要の機銃を撃ちながら、爆発すると複数のグレネードをばらまき敵車両を追尾するロケット砲を撃ちつつ、数秒ごとに補給物資や大量の味方歩兵を呼び出し、絶え間ない戦闘機からの空爆とヘリからの支援攻撃を受け、なおかつこちらの体力は毎秒ごとor敵を倒すごとに回復し続けるという、もはや「親切心から言うけど、お前らさっさと諦めて帰ったほうがいいよ」状態になる。
もう前も見えないほどの爆発の連続（敵が自動マーキングされるアップグレードを取れば視認性も両立できる）で、味方兵士の死因の半分は自分が撃ったロケットの爆風。
だから前に出すぎるなって言ってるだろ！
それでも最後のステージは迅速な敵の特攻車両の把握と的確な支援の要請が重要で、20分生存の実績を取るのは結構難しいと思う。

欠点は、値段と内容的に十分だと思うが、底が浅く飽きが早いこと。
あとすでにクリアしたステージでは経験値が稼げないこと（よってクリア前の難しいステージで物理で殴るといったことができない）
まあ、初見プレイ時と、たまに起動してバリバリ撃ちまくるぶんには楽しく遊べるだろう。

極右化したムスリム過激集団が内戦参戦をきっかけに中東地域とアフリカ地域を支配し2020年にヨーロッパを侵略しようとしてそれを食い止めるランボー並みに強すぎる兵士の物語 です。基本的にAIの特徴はあまり少なくフラッグや使用されている車や戦車などがニュースで見るような映像そっくりに描かれています。過去に罪の無い一般人や警察、軍人などを皆殺しる連続無差別殺人鬼シュミレーターを開発したポーランドの企業のサイドプロジェクトとのことでレビューサイトによると”社会的抗議”による作品とのこと残酷なゲームを作っている会社なので表現もかなり残酷です。敵の叫び声や話す言語も生々しさを感じさせられるためプレイする人間を選ぶと思います。泣き叫ぶ声や怒り狂った声が苦手な人は控えたほうが良いかもしれません。味方と敵は小さい米粒みたいなのにも関わらずアニメーションがものすごく細かく作られていて足が吹っ飛んだりごくたまにですが臓器が画面内に飛んできたりとグロテスクな部分も見ることが出来ます。現在今のところ4面、Unreal Engine 4によるマップやMODなどを作る開発キットなどがゲームを購入時についてきます。ライブラリ→ツール→同ゲームエディタで出来ます。BGMに関しては中東っぽさ出してるけどどちらかというと映画の音楽って感じが伝わってきます。かっこいいといえばかっこいいです。歩兵AIだけ少し近未来っぽい感じで良い迷彩服を着ています。

ゲームシステムについては360度回転するというランボーのあのシーンですね。あんな感じで隠れることが出来ないようになっています。ポイント制でポイントが貯まるとアップグレードで武器やプレイヤーが強くなってもうバケモンみたいになったりします。他にも仲間を呼んだり空爆要請したりとお楽しみの部分が合って素晴らしいと思います。もしもゲームセンターにあったら多分1回は遊ぶかな？w

25793501.review:
A door flew off and sheared one of my soldiers head off.
I saw a facebook post saying people were upset about this game, controversy, political BS blabla, so I went and bought it. 
This is a very well made game. The ragdoll and where you shoot people and how it affects them is spot on, I have my body count turned to unlimited and vehicles destroyed all stay there, it creates a real battlefield, which I think is nice. The graphics are really good for a $5 game, its an arcade style shooter as many have said. The upgrades help, but even then the game is still challenging. Blasting away waves of terrorists till you get overwhelmed. The terrorists act smartly (sometimes). What I mean by this is if you have shot the people out of a vehicle, other troops will try to man the turret or the driver seat and use it against you, instead of leaving it a husk. You can cause damage to buildings when you upgrade your MG. When you shoot at hummers, the gunner never dies unless the vehicle blows up, that is my main issue with this game TRUST ME ITS ANNOYING AS HELL AND DOESN'T QUITE MAKE SENSE, other than that, its well made, the AI has some brains, though sometimes your soldiers will be standing in a line and get plowed by an enemy truck like a bunch of idiots, or run and cover next to a flaming vehicle. I guarantee you you will have spent $5 on much worse things. 9.5/10 buy it and help protect the free world!

TL;DR - It's good. Buy it.

You ever wanted to kill those Islamic State "see you next tuesdays"? Now you can!

This game basically pits you as a stationary gunner (like a classic arcade game) and you have to fight of endless amounts of ISIS terrorists. The level designs are good and the game feels really smooth and crisp. The graphics on the game are decent, which is good because no one wants to kill pixellated ISIS soldiers now, do they? 
The game is also moving to Xbox One, and although it is moving to the world of peasantry, it shows that the game is substantially good if it is an indie game getting a [strike] peasant [/strike] console release. I've clocked a good hour and a half nearly in about two sessions. The game is insanely addictive and the leaderboard function always adds to competetiveness (is that a word?) of the game. The ranking system, which essentially isn't "ranks" but more just "you got promoted blah blah have some skill points" works well. The skill points can be spent on things that help you in your efforts to bring down Allah and his mottley ISIS crew.

Overall the game is great but the only problem I have with it is when I call artillery in and I end up becoming collateral damage at the hands of my allies.

GG

24902582.review:
It's a casual game, a rail shooter, mowing down neverending hordes of bad guys until your own inevitable demise. A generation ago, this would have been a coin-op game. No, it does not have overly sophisticated graphics or anything; it just delivers on its premise, offering a few minutes of pure mayhem when you have a half hour of downtime to spare.

The only thing everyone obsesses on is the fact that the enemies are IS (aka ISIS or Daesh). I do not understand why this is controversial. If this same game had Nazis as enemies instead, it would have had zero controversy. Hundreds of games (and movies) feature Nazis as convenient, easily disposed of cannonfodder that the heroes may slaughter without guilt. Why is it different with IS, when these guys are equally as irredeemablly evil as the Waffen SS? You are tasked with holding off the worst of the worst of the worst that humanity currently has to offer. There is literally no force on earth more evil than ISIS at this time, is there? What is the controversy?

游戏本身内涵不足，几乎没有什么剧情，开头有段背景描述，大意可以用一句话概括，ISIS从恐怖分子变成恐怖主义国家逐渐壮大进攻欧洲。

设定相当不喜欢，无论是ISIS的装备还是友军的装备，我觉得做得相当不走心，国内找个小厂设定都会比他们强，还有16年机枪不用Minigun？这又不是几十年前。现在不加反坦克导弹系统也应该加个连发榴弹炮吧？

总共两个武器加5个技能。要我说完全可以换成4个武器，火神炮、连发榴弹炮、标枪导弹、毒刺导弹，比现在这种组合强太多了。

总感觉是把半成品拿来卖了，然后开个创意工坊让玩家帮他们补完，聪明但是让人觉得呵呵。

51卖贵了，不值，对我来说半价我都不想买，这游戏的好评真让人觉得不可思议。

不过想一下也觉得合理，毕竟这种游戏就是面向那种完全不走脑子也不看剧情，只顾杀得爽的玩家设计的。

稍微看点内涵的玩家，不如把这钱留下来攒个The Witcher什么的。

24435679.review:
본격 진공청소기 게임

정가 9510원, 할인 25% 해서 7130원에 구매했어요.

깔끔한 그래픽에 이 정도 액션이면 합리적인 가격이라 생각합니다.

이런 게임에 무슨 팁이 필요하겠냐만은, 지금까지(3번째 맵 해제했지만 너무 어렵네요) 스킬 중에 체감이 좋은 것들이 있기에 함 적어봅니다.

1. 머신건 트리
스킬 트리 중 제일 먼저 클리어해놓는게 좋습니다.
저는 스킬포인트 아껴서 제일 먼저 리로드 안 하는 것(4포인트)부터 해제했구요.
그 다음으로는 탄속 두배(이거로 픽업트럭 정도는 로켓 안 쏘고 처리 가능), 폭발력 추가가 체감이 좋았습니다.

2. 다른 트리는 취향껏
4포인트지만 적 위치 알려주는 거나 로켓 쪽은 그나마 도움이 되지만 물량 쏟아지는 중반 이후에는 체력 증가 쪽은 그렇게 큰 도움이 되질 않습니다.
아직 안 찍었지만 오히려 보병이나 포격 지원, 공중 지원 쪽이 우선적으로 도움이 될 것 같아요.

겨울 세일 들어가면 50% 이상 할인 예상해봅니다만 게임 많이 해서 현자타임 잦은 저한테는 의외로 시간 때우기 좋은 게임입니다.

맴이 4개 뿐인지라 집중해서 하면 금방 끝내겠지만 가성비가 좋아 10점 만점에 7점 정도 주고 싶네요.

24433231.review:
A short, simple, fun, arcade-like shooter.

In this game, you play as a turret gunner defending Europe's shores from ISIS invaders. For the entirety of the game, you use a stationary machine gun and rockets to mow down hordes of suicidal terrorists and vehicles. You gain experience from kills, which you use to level up your abilities and activate supply drops, infantry support, artillery, airstrikes, and helicopter support. There are four levels in the main game, and it takes about 3-4 hours to complete, including all upgrades. The graphics and sound are all very good.

24402628.review:
-我玩过的最好玩的抢滩登陆！！！
-次时代抢滩登陆，依旧精神时刻紧绷!
-更加好的效果 更加好的画面。
-更多的技能，耐玩，好玩。
-而且还有创意工坊。（虽然现在就1个...）
--(我现在在第二张图的全球第47名，欢迎超越 XD （花了我整整1个半小时！）)

-剧情
在不遥远的未来，真主的信徒们打赢了发生在现在的战争。但是他们的领袖一拍脑门“不行，我们要把真主的光芒传播的更远”。然后开始了对万恶的资本主义的圣战。
而你则作为自由民主的卫士一个人面对无尽的真主圣战军，拿着自由民主的M60机枪突突突突。

-在宣传视频中就可以看到是有5个技能。
1.第一个自然就是补给箱当杀够一定数量敌人的时候，集满第一格子就可以召唤空投补给，到后面升级一次可以投下来两个补给。
2.第二个就是召唤援兵，当你按下之后就会有一个班的步兵从下面堡垒出来，能击杀步兵，准头也不错，而且敌人还会主动攻击这些步兵，但是对载具没啥效用。
3.第三个就是投下炸弹，数量较少，到后面用到的时候其实不多。
4.第四个是召唤飞机进行轰炸，轰炸整个海滩，清理的时候特别有用，假如敌人多，一次能攒出挺多能量。
5.第五个是召唤直升机进行攻击，能攻击敌人能攻击载具，存在时间也不短。

打开地图的条件就是击杀敌人还有击杀载具，你要能打，就能一直打下去。并且在右上角还有着全球排名。

另外教大家一下怎样活得更久：
--1.*重中之重的一点，保持自己场上随时有回血空投补给。只要一个就能理解信春哥！瞬间满血。
在大量载具围攻你的时候，血条下降的会非常快，这能非常有效地帮你争取非常多的时间消灭载具。
--2.所有载具都是有弱点的，货车性载具弱点就是位于后面的机枪手，只要击毙了它对你造成的伤害只是一个普通小兵（驾驶员会到位置下车射击你）
    
悍马的弱点就在驾驶舱那个位置，千万别打炮塔，你没法杀死里面的人同时你的子弹也会被削弱无力。

--3.随时保持场上有着两队以上的陆战队员，在20分钟之后敌人攻击就会到一个顶峰，所有常规位置都会开始刷小兵，这些小兵会优先攻击你的陆战队员，其次才是你，小兵到后面基数极为庞大，所以对你的威胁不亚于载具。记住，常备陆战队。

--4.假如你场上有了空投补给 有了陆战队，赶紧攒武装直升机。3与4技能为轰炸，清场专用，而且还会把你的补给炸掉，假如你要打持久战，最好别用。武直作用非常大，清小兵速度也是一流。召唤出来之后继续 攒补给 召唤陆战队（他们死的非常快）。等飞机走了就专心攒武直，争取不间断。

-5.最后一张地图会出现驾驶自爆汽车的阿拉，假如你看到能开的民用汽车，赶快打爆它！

-点击页面内右侧绿色的关注按钮，关注[url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Seniorplayer#curation] 电玩狂热爱好者 [/url] ，以获取更多游戏评测、资讯、攻略。

I mean, this game isn't bad at all - I sure as hell enjoyed playing it. But I think the overall design degrades over time as you play it and beat it. I have almost 4 hours on record; I actually beat this game in one sitting throughout the day. Once you unlock pretty much everything you're set to go and there isn't much left to do beside achievement hunt I suppose. I got to the last level with a good amount of stuff unlocked and I almost literally couldn't die because it was too easy. So I think some levels are fun, others easy, and some hard. I honestly wouldn't pay full price for the game right now; there's just not enough in my opinion to spend $8 on. Other than that the game is pretty awesome! It's smooth, well thought out, and regardless to what I said before it does have you coming back if you like endless wave games - though I think the tower gun layout is different to most endless wave games. I think it comes down to opinion mostly - so taste over actual rating - if this game is perfect or not.

And about the Islamophobia: If you consider suicide bombers and ISIS flags a representation of Islam and therefore islamophobic - man you're going to be triggered hard here. Though I doubt you'd leave your safe space long enough to actually buy this game and play it.

24156646.review:
動けない機関銃座に座ってひたすら迫り来る大軍を撃ちまくって防衛するゲーム。(ゲーム性に余り関係ないので組織うんぬんは無しで)
その場からは動けないが斜め後ろなどからも敵が襲ってくる事があるので、
銃座自体を360度回しながら敵の来る方向に向ける必要がある。
最初はこのシステムは後ろから敵が来るという違和感程度だったが、後になるに連れかなりの難関要素となる。
他に成長要素やゲーム中様々な支援を呼べる要素があるがシステム自体に問題はない。

現在このゲームには4つステージがあり、それぞれ一つ前のステージで敵や車両を倒した総数に応じたアンロック方式になっている。
最初の砂浜は上陸してくる敵を迎え撃つステージで余り後ろからの攻撃はなく、自分の想像していたイメージに近いので、楽しかった。
次は港ステージで、建物の影や上などから隠れながら攻撃してきたり、横のコンテナの中に入っていたりでゲリラ風だったが楽しめた。

問題は次の空港のようなステージで、夜間なので敵が見難く、更に自爆兵が大量に走ってくるので初見は1～2分で死ぬ。
これを切り抜けても、前述の通り四方八方から機銃車両が来る(特に右側は酷く、５台走ってくるパターンが連続で来たりする)ので、
違う方向の車両の対処をしている最中に違う方向から来た車両に凄まじい勢いで体力を削られる事が多い。
このステージにはバグもあり、支援物資で落ちてきた物資箱が地面を突き抜けて取れずに落ちていったりする。

かなりの難易度なので死にまくりながらキル数を稼ぎ、やっとの思いでノルマをクリアして最後のステージの港町へ。
このステージは明るいので視界の心配はないが、ここでは自爆車両が猛スピードで突っ込んでくる。
もちろん当たれば大ダメージだが、左右で別れて出て来て、更に割と耐久力が高く機銃で迎撃してても惰性で爆風の範囲に入る事もある。なので、対応が少しでも遅れると必然的にダメージを食らう。これが最初に、しかも頻繁に出てくるのでかなりの高難易度である。

別に高難易度な事自体は特に問題なく、現に最初のステージも序盤はなかなか難易度が高く車両の処理に失敗すると即死したりする。
しかし、敵が潔くほとんど正面からやってくるのと、対処法を覚える事やスキルの解除によって長く生き残れるようになり、
大軍相手に機銃という力で立ち向かっている感じがして熱くなったし楽しめた。

しかし、後半の2ステージは自爆特攻の多さ、視認性の悪さ、半ば敵車両に包囲されている状況などで、
機銃などを強化していても厳しい場面が数多くあり、理不尽な難易度に感じてしまった。

これ以外にも細かい点で不満点はあり、支援物資で落とす物資がランダム(体力回復かロケット弾の補充)で
回復が欲しい時にロケット弾が出たりする。(落とされる箱が2つになるスキルがあるので１箱ずつの固定にした方が良いと感じた）
前述の仕様なので、回復をステージに貯めておくのだが物資箱が壊れた瞬間に回復なので、
手違いで撃ってしまったり、最悪敵の車両が壊してしまい、いらない時に回復してしまう。(回復もロケット弾のようにストックしていいと思う)
クリアしたステージではスキルを取得するための経験値が入らないのもイライラするポイント。

値段は安いが薄いゲーム内容と比べると割高感が出てくるので、
セールの時に買うと最初の2ステージ分くらい(3～4時間)は楽しめると思う。

敵に向かってマシンガンを撃つだけの簡単なゲーム。
ワーッと攻めてきた敵をダダダーッとやっつけるだけでゲーム的な奥深さは皆無ですがやたら楽しい。
最初は2分も持ちこたえられないくらい難しいが、スキルが揃ってくると長時間の生存が可能になり、私の場合は最終的に50分耐えて完全に飽きて眠くなって自分からゲームオーバーになるくらい長時間生き延びる事が出来る無双ゲーと化します。

28種類のスキルは全部取得可能、マシンガンとグレネードランチャーと五種類のスコアストリークが使用可能（弾とヘルスのケアパケ、援護の歩兵、迫撃砲、空爆、攻撃ヘリ）、全4面ありますがロケーション以外大した違いはなし、だいたい5時間でクリア可能。
新しいルールとか覚えるのが面倒くさいけどゲームを遊んでスカッとしたい時におすすめです。

Don't bother. Rail shooters are dead. IS Defense maybe is technically a decent product. But content-wise? Gameplay-wise? Lacking. Hollow. Old.

23106686.review:
If you can ignore the racist undertones (And the not-so-subtle actual racism in the reviews) for a moment and you’ll realize that they’re mostly just the same stock enemies as anything else over time. Germans, Russians, Koreans, whatever enemy the US has at any given moment are usually fair game in, uh, games. 

What we have here is basically an arcade shooter. It is a sort of tower defense where you act as a lone tower with a few abilities at your command, as well as an RPG element with a talent tree that will help health regeneration, give troops more health, and more rocket ammo. There’s a lot more but that’s just an example. 
You start with a beach level where you have to kill 2,000 terrorists. Sounds like a lot, and I died only 300 enemies in… the first time. Turns out all the experience and talents you earn are cumulative. When I ‘failed’ the second time It added my ~700 kills to the previous 300 and then I was at ~1000 or so into unlocking the second map.

You have several weapons in your arsenal including five different active abilities that “Charge up” as you kill enemies. The level 1 is a supply drop and the level 2 summons a few ground troops that I find are actually extremely helpful. After summoning about three groups of them I pushed fairly far into one game.

I will admit, the game feels good. I can understand how some people may find it boring but I find the explosions satisfying and I like watching the evolution from a peaceful beachfront to a horrifying warzone.

The game has more depth than readily apparent. There’s a sort of resource management to a degree. The skills you get work in tiers. For example, if I used the Tier 3 ability (Artillery bombardment), That bar would tank down to the first tier ability (The supply drop). The more you save, the more powerful supports you receive, culminating on an attack chopper that sticks around for a couple minutes to give you some much needed breathing room.
And the supply drops don’t go away when they drop, you have to shoot the large boxes to benefit from them. So if the support drops a health, you can leave it there for emergencies. So you have to balance your support out; Sometimes I call for a supply drop but don’t do anything with the health boxes it drops until later on.
You also have to worry about suicide bombers so you can’t just ignore all the ground troopers and focus on vehicles.

The whole game is a unique balancing act of quick decision making “Should I do this… or this?” This is impressive for very simple mechanics.
Not something you’d spend all day on but it’s a neat little sprint to see just how far you can get, and if you can beat your last high score (Which you probably can considering you probably have a couple new skills in your arsenal).

22892956.review:
IS Defence:
~~~~~~~~~

The year is 2020.  North Africa is now under the control of IS, who is gathering a large army to launch the invasion of Europe via the Mediterranean Sea. NATO headquarters knows the exact locations of the launch, and is in need of courageous soldiers to stand against the invader until the end! Soldier, it is time to fight for the free world! Sign here to enrol!

IS Defence is an action / rail shooter game where you take control of a NATO soldier who is stationed on a vantage point with his machine gun, and you have to kill as many invaders as possible until your glorious death.  This game has three maps available to you: The Sicilians Shores, The Spanish Harbour and The Croatian Mainland. You will have to beat the first map to unlock the second, and the second map to unlock the third.  To do so you will have to eliminate a specific number of terrorists and vehicles. 

At the start of a game, you will be stationary with your machine-gun, a rocket launcher and a certain amount of ammunition. You will notice two gauges on your screen; on the left is the support gauge and on the right your health gauge. Each time you eliminate an enemy (soldier or vehicle) you will see the left gauge going up and each time you pass a certain level, you will be able to call on your support team for assistance, which includes: supplies, infantry, artillery, airstrikes and helicopters. On the other hand, each time you get shot, or a suicidal enemy soldier manages to blow himself up at your vantage point, your right gauge will decrease really quickly until you see a black screen, which will mean that it’s game over! Also, you will acquire skill points in each map and use them to either upgrade yourself, your machine gun, your rocket launcher or your support calls. I really like the progressive difficulty throughout each map of the game. You will find that the first couple of waves will be nice and simple to eliminate, but then you will need to know the right support combination to stay alive as long as you can. It will become a fast and furious game, and you will have plenty of fun. 

Graphically the game looks good, with great explosions here, there and everywhere. Good sound effects, too! In my opinion, however, the soldier’s animations could have been better. 

It is a short game - you will probably unlock the other 2 maps within 3.5 hours but you will surely come back to it over and over. It is a fun game. 

Positives:
~~~~~~~  

-	Good graphics
-	Good skills tree
-	Fast, fun and addictive gameplay
-	Achievements and trading cards

Negatives:
~~~~~~~~ 

-	Only 3 maps available
-	Soldiers animation could have been better

IS Defence is a fun and fast rail shooter, it will keep you shooting for hours!

8/10

Key provided by developer/publisher for review purposes. Any opinions expressed are entirely my own!

22797123.review:
Much like Hatred before it, this game is usually a game you hear about through its ~controversial~ nature, and if you do pick it up, you find that controversial subject material doesn't always mean an excellent game. This is not an excellent game. It's a mediocre one. Do you like games where you stay in one spot and fight off endless waves of enemies until you ultimately die and get your score tallied up? Then you'll probably be okay with this one. Otherwise, you should probably pass. Even for people who enjoy the gameplay, they might find it somewhat stale after a while. In my case, I played it for about three hours. Two of those hours were spent dying over and over again until I finally unlocked all the perks. The entire third hour was spent on the "desert" level, gunning down the same waves ad nauseam and realizing, holy shit, I'm effectively invincible. This is as hard as it's going to get. I won't lose unless I actively sabotage myself and self-impose challenges (i.e. conveniently missing all the supply boxes, forgetting to call in infantry, etc.)

I look forward to seeing what kind of new life is infused into this game through its mod support, but the vanilla game, as it stands, is ultimately bland and forgettable. Get it if it's on sale, but at full price, you're better off elsewhere.

As a Hatred fan (obviously) I was very excited for IS Defense. Now this isnt going to be a bashing review. Im going to give both positives and negatives.

THE GOOD: 
 
-Simplicity, Its a simple game with a simple goal, kill everything that hates democracy.

-The guns and explosions- The gunplay is fun, its a stationary shooter where you get to mow down durkas with a big machine gun and a rocket launcher, the explosions are beautiful and very well animated.

-Repetitive, but a fun kind of repetitive.The goal is the same on every map, kill durkas. Each map has a level of difficulty and  I find myself dying after a short while but that doesnt stop me from trying again because its too damn fun.

-The skill tree has very nice skills that will really help you out in the long run.

-The help you get to call in ( Soldiers, air strikes, Helicopters) gives the game more life, its not just you versus the Isis horde, you get to call in soldiers to help fight and get to call in air strikes to annihilate everything around you (Your soldiers included so be careful).


THE BAD:  theres gonna be a bit of stuff here so bare with me

- The graphics look great but makes my coputer run a little hotter than I like.

-The Soldiers skins arent so beautiful, youll notice that looking at your troops closely show that they look very bland and the skin quality is very low.

-AI can sometimes be very dumb, Ill have friendly troops all the way across the map shooting at durkas from a distance, Enemy cars tend to crash into other burnt cars or just plain crash into your MG nest. 

-The animations are a little wonky for enemies and friendlies alike, it seems as if they took the animation from the soldiers in hatred and just pasted it in there and said "Good enough".

-Sounds are great but also have sound clips from the game hatred as well, in my opinion thats kind of lazy.

- The progression system is too fast for my taste. I get too many skillpoints too fast, kinda makes me feel less accomplished if I can 8 skill points in one game.

-Overall the game just seems rushed an unpolished, it looks like it needs some work.

Thats my review, this is still a great game for the price tag and I deffinately recommend you give this game a try.

22768675.review:
[h1]An intensive shooter in stationary locales that takes current events into the realm of tomorrow’s newspapers; IS Defense is a mesmerizing bullet arcade. [/h1]
The music is fantastic and adrenaline charging. Add to that the sound effects and voices of enemy terrorists and you are sure to find this game something you will come back for more and more. The opening movie is laced with video & news shorts from today’s news, and weaves out the projected path of IS threat in the European world. It really makes you think about what is happening around you.  

I’ve only had the game a short time, but since many are interested in this game, I wanted to do the review now and lend support to this awesome game. The graphics are great. The premise is simple enough. And, the firepower is great! The card art is something worth collecting as well.

I often say I’m not into fps games, though shooting is something that I can do fairly decently in games. I just normally don’t enjoy heavy combat elements. This one is intense, and you are stationary, making it probably more intensive, as far as fire power goes. You literally mow the waves of incoming enemies down as the suicide bombers attempt to reach you. With the perfect defensive position, your job is to shoot and reload. That’s it. The first level has you on the beach, as waves of pontoon boats are followed by ships with pickups. They all attempt to land a force on the beach and sweep past you. You hear the screams of the terrorists as they wage what they see as a “holy war.” And, you are reminded that war is not always a choice.  

The game reminds me of the words of George Orwell, “People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.” If you are like me, you don’t like blaming a group of people nor a religion, nor other non-germane causes for the evil that takes place. But, the IS is not a religion. It is a terrorist group that is as much a problem for the Muslim community as for the rest of the world. If you don’t see the difference between IS and the Islamic faith, then this game may not be for you. Another word of caution; the shooting is intensive. I usually need frequent breaks when playing shooters like this. 

[h1]The game is simple, straightforward, and offers many leveling up rewards for the gamer who likes “bullet-hell” type games. The main difference is you are behind the bullets for much of the game.[/h1] I recommend IS Defense for teens and adults interested in current world events and defending their homeland from terrorists.

22759598.review:
It was with much trepidation that I decided to feature Destructive Creations second game on Steam IS Defense. My initial fear was that this was just going to be a trash game without  much thought  or effort put into the game. I was expecting a poorly executed political message and one that played on people’s fears and hatred of the Islamic State. I was expecting a game was almost designed to leave a bad taste in the mouths of non-radical Muslims around the world. After all, this is the same indie developer that developed and published Hatred – a game that is banned in Australia and obviously which I cannot purchase from Steam. Hatred has to have been one of the most controversial games released onto Steam in the past couple of years. That they followed with a game where the player’s task is to kill the Islamic State is surely one of the very few ways in which they could have found an even more troubled subject matter.

However, I can say that after playing the game that I believe that my expectations were in fact wrong. IS Defense may in fact prove to be a controversial game and others may find the game to be offensive or in bad taste but I do not believe that this will prove to be overwhelmingly so especially when compared to Hatred. In fact I would go so far as to suggest that I found the game to be a pleasing back to the future type game of some of the games that I have vivid memories of enjoying when I was a youngster. Games such as Operation Wolf, Beach Head, Bad Dog McCree and Dynamite Duke. It is the type of on rails shooter experience that isn’t often made anymore because modern technologies has far surpassed the minimalistic style gameplay available to make games back in those days. In the past the level of controversy featuring such anti-western subject matter (e.g. the United States Vs. Russia, games based on the Vietnam War, etc.) have had some controversy but the majority have been able to ignore it. Therefore I surmise that the controversy here is that the subject matter is so fresh and in our face that some may find it offensive.

Before writing this feature I went so far as to approaching an Islamic friend that I have long had on Steam in regards to his opinion on the game. His opinion is much in the same way as many of the reviews are on the Steam game page. He claims that he is not offended by the material because IS is absolute extremist Islam and does not and will likely never represent true Islam. Therefore he claims that those who claim the game to be “Islamaphobic” are absolutely wrong. However, he does urge that those who consider playing the game to understand the cultural and religious differences between a common non-extremist Islamic person and an extremist. The gulf between the two, he argues, is just as significant as someone claiming to be Christian or Catholic and an Atheist.

I believe that the opening video – which thankfully can be skipped entirely before launching the game – provides a very realistic and somewhat educated viewpoint of the potential IS has over the coming years.  It also does a very good job of setting the game up. Sadly, in my opinion, it is by far the best part of the game. For a full release game that is asking consumers $7.99 per copy you’re getting three maps and some repetitive shooting game play – fire IS troops with your weapon or use a rocket launcher to kill them. It’s very basic but so too were the same type of game decades ago. What is fresh, however, is the nice usage of special effects in the form of explosions and other visuals. The computer AI is hit and miss and not something that I expect will be memorable.  A bit more effort into the development of the game could have turned it into a memorable title but at the end of the day it is the subject matter that is the most memorable aspect of the game.

If you’re looking for a relatively short on rails shooter that deals with potential real world futurism then IS Defense is worth a look in.

[h1]Introduction[/h1]

First, I have to add some kind of disclaimer reading other reviews from gamers. This game is NOT islamophobic. ISIS is a terrorist faction as many others related or non-related with religion.
